name: ImagePlus
description: API mod that adds more image formats

force-autodetect.name: Force Format Autodetect
force-autodetect.description:
Ignores the requested image format and always tries to autodetect it from the file.  
Allows to use different image formats in texture packs and more.  
Adds a small performance overhead, but it is negligible.

disable-png.name: Disable custom PNG loader
disable-png.description:
Disables the custom PNG loader to prefer the cocos2d one instead.  
Useful if you experience issues with some images.
